body_html:
In my case it was caused by running it under Windows with
session_config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
without this I got another error, that was masked by
failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED
body_text:
In my case it was caused by running it under Windows with
session_config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
without this I got another error, that was masked by
 failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED
body:
In my case it was caused by running it under Windows with 
`session_config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True`
without this I got another error, that was masked by 
` failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED`
